body.name: Glade Air Freshener Room Spray, Rose & Bloom, 8.3 oz, 6 Count
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 11 hrs 53 mins
features: Rose & Bloom Glade Air Freshener Spray has a fragrance crafted by master perfumers, with notes of pink rose, violet leaf and sandalwood
Now with 2x more fragrance (vs Glade 7.6 oz spray), it’s easier than ever to enjoy waves of freshness – the can got a fashion makeover and the push button gives you improved comfort and control
Feel waves of fresh energy with this Glade air freshener – it uses 100% natural propellant, and is made without phthalates, parabens, formaldehyde, nitro musks or dyes
Surround yourself with a room air freshener fragrance infused with essential oils
Freshen any room in a spritz with this Glade aerosol spray – it makes it easy to add a refreshing spritz of personality to your home
body.description: It’s easier than ever to create your secret garden. Rose & Bloom Glade Air Freshener Spray is now bursting with 2x more fragrance*, giving you extra power to revive the vibe. This air freshener for home use a fragrance crafted by master perfumers, with notes of pink rose, violet leaf and sandalwood. And there’s more great news – the can also got a sleek makeover, while the push button has been changed to give you improved comfort and control. You still get the instantly refreshing burst of scent you love, but now it comes with 2x the fragrance*. Surround yourself with a room air freshener fragrance infused with essential oils. Feel waves of fresh energy and get a fragrance boost that uses 100% natural propellent. It’s made without phthalates, parabens, formaldehyde, nitro musks or dyes. With 2x the fragrance*, Add a bit of glam to your home with Rose & Bloom. * vs Glade 7.6 oz spray

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Superb fragrance; Glade’s new natural propellant makes a mess
reviews.reviewText: Very nice rose fragrance, not that commonly available. Its presence in the room lasts for a good long time. However, the 6 pack arrived in tall aerosol spray cans, not pump bottles as pictured. Also I want to point out that the move to “natural” propellants in these air fresheners means you will have misty, damp floors, like you had sprayed (for example only) Febreze fabric spray as a room air freshener. The can sez “wipe floors dry”. Didn’t used to have to do that, but those who purchase the new formulas risk being left with a slippery floor after the product has dried. So the consumer should now be prepared to wash their floors now after using these products? Another example where “natural” formats turn out inferior in comparison to their original versions!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars a good bargain
reviews.reviewText: 6 rose scented air sprays is a good bargain when the floral scent is not overwhelming. I opened the package on my enclosed porch. My room is about 30 ft. from there. When I entered my room the scent had filled the air from that distance. It doesn't last very long, for less than $1.50 a container is fine. It smells of real roses.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells so good’
reviews.reviewText: Scent isn’t too strong and lasts for a short time but works best in smaller areas likeThe bathroom or bedroom.

reviews.reviewerName: still waiting for delivery since two weeks ago. First time this happens

reviews.reviewText: Rose 🌹 room sprays is my favorite scent of smell because it's the only room sprays that kills the tobacco smoke. Thanks June

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells great and lasts!
reviews.reviewText: I like this spray. I like the scent. It is not overpowering and seems to get the job done. It does smell rosy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars I like the scent BUT
reviews.reviewText: The button area to press is so hard to press! I don’t know why I tried one of the others and it’s the same. Maybe this is a reject group ? I have arthritis in my hand so that’s part of the problem but I think they need to address this problem
